title: Beautiful 1 Bedroom Near Loyola Medical Center in Forest Park
neighborhood: Forest Park, River Forest, Oak Park, Loyola Medical Center
map_address: 7535 Jackson Blvd near Des Plaines Ave
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   Call or text Nick at (847) 404-8319  Apartments Feature: -New Kitchens with Updated Appliances -Oak Cabinets -Quartz Countertops -Hardwood Floors  -Updated Ceramic Tile Baths  -On-Site Laundry -On-Site Maintenance and Management  One block from CTA blue line and Eisenhower Expressway (I-290 E/W).   Near Madison St, Rush Oak Park Hospital, Loyola Medical Center, Maywood, River Forest, Downtown Oak Park and more.  2nd Month of rent free for qualified applicants signing a 2 year lease  Utility Package ONLY $76 covers Heat, Hot Water, Water And Trash. Tenants pay electricity and cooking gas separately.
